name: Saviour (KRedCell)
description:
概要 Summary

“Saviour”是一款受到许多经典Meta游戏启发的实验性游戏。你将在游戏里扮演“你自己”——此时是一个你素不相识的人的救世主，你需要通过你对自己电脑的理解、你的善意和一个标准的命令提示符控制台帮助那个失去记忆且被困在密室里的人逃出去。
并且记住，
永远不要自己关掉游戏窗口。

"Saviour" is an experimental game which is inspired by famous META games. You'll be acting as yourself, at the time you are the saviour of a person who is amnesia and get stucked in a series of mestery rooms. All you need is your understanding of you computer, your kindness and a regular COMMAND LINE.
And NEVER FORGET,
to NOT CLOSE THE GAME WINDOW.

语言支持 Language Support

游戏支持两种语言，并且可以拓展。

The game supports two languages, and it's extensible.
